name: Reliability Calculator
description: IEC TR 62380 compliant reliability analysis for KiCad projects. Calculate component failure rates, build system block diagrams with series/parallel/k-of-n configurations, perform Monte Carlo and sensitivity analysis, and generate professional reports.
description_full:
The Reliability Calculator plugin provides comprehensive reliability analysis for electronic systems designed in KiCad.

Key Features:
- Component-level failure rate calculations (λ) for ICs, discretes, passives, connectors
- Visual block diagram editor for defining system topology
- Series, parallel, and k-of-n redundancy configurations
- Configurable EOS (Electrical OverStress) parameters
- Working time ratio (τ_on) for duty-cycled operation
- Thermal expansion mismatch calculations
- Monte Carlo uncertainty analysis
- Sobol sensitivity analysis
- Professional reports in HTML, Markdown, CSV, JSON formats

Based on IEC TR 62380:2004 standard.
